alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Culpeper; Eastern Loudoun; Greene; Madison; Nelson; Northwest Prince William; Orange; Southern Fauquier (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 16 at 6:37AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Maryland and Virginia, including the following areas: in central Maryland, Northwest Howard and Northwest Montgomery. In Virginia, Albemarle, Culpeper, Eastern Loudoun, Greene, Madison, Nelson, Northwest Prince William, Orange and Southern Fauquier. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Numerous showers and thunderstorms are possible across the warned area through this afternoon. Storms will be capable of producing heavy rainfall, with additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches possible. Locally higher amounts are also possible. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Albemarle; Culpeper; Eastern Loudoun; Greene; Madison; Nelson; Northwest Prince William; Orange; Southern Fauquier
